'''Amidst Poetic Pondering''' is an indoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Jean]], [[Lisa]], [[Fischl]], [[Mona]] and [[Eula]].

It is obtained from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

Blueprints of [[Exquisite Cuihua Bookshelf]], a necessary furniture needed to build this set, can only be obtainable after reaching up [[Serenitea Pot/Adeptal Mirror|Adeptal Mirror]] Round 4 and building up to 160 pieces of furniture.
